vote.title: Authorize Supplemental Agreement No. 1 to the professional services contract with Terracon Consultants, Inc. to provide additional work at various sites to complete elevator systems maintenance, roof and heating, ventilation, and air conditioning replacements - Not to exceed $378,600.00, from $1,557,880.00 to $1,936,480.00 - Financing: Water Capital Improvement F Fund ($164,986.08), Water Capital Improvement G Fund ($164,986.07), and Storm Drainage Management Capital Construction Fund ($48,627.85)
